availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jerry Haner (Scott County, Kentucky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Haner. Father of Harriett Haner, Bledsoe Haner, Maleta Haner, Bluford Haner, and Annah Haner. Hotel keeper in Scott County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 951.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Stamping Ground, p. 326B.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Scott County Assignee Bond Book, 1897-1916; Executor Bonds, 1837-1838, 1856-1963, p. 416 of microfilm (Accessed via Ancestry.com on April 9, 2020).
